articles.author: Business Insider India
articles.title: Google and Samsung join forces to help Android developers sync fitness data between apps seamlessly - Business Insider India
articles.description: Google and Samsung are collaborating to develop a single hub for health and fitness data - Health Connect. According to Google, users will have more control
articles.content:
Google and Samsung have joined hands to give developer an opportunity to sync users' health and fitness data
 between Android apps and their devices.
Called 'Health Connect', the platform and API (… [+1527 chars]
